data.why:
I've been finalizing a Perl module to extract statistics and
    timeseries from NLANR PMA TSH packet trace files. I will be
    releasing the code soon to the pma list, but I thought it was a good
    idea to post it on CPAN as well.

    I'm also working on another module that aggregates a number of
    subroutines I have developed over time to analyze ns2 simulation
    trace files. But that would not be ready before end of April.
